forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. West northwest wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 56. West northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

weather_report:
As the sun slips quietly beneath the horizon, the clouds gather a gentle whisper of the night. Currently, Downtown San Francisco is cloaked in a slight haze, with the possibility of rain lingering delicately in the air. The temperature rests at a nippy 46 degrees, under a blanket of mostly cloudy skies. A northwesterly wind dances lightly around the city, adding a cool touch to the night, hinting at the intricacies of weather yet to come. The forecast hints at daytime clouds gradually yielding to a moderate sun, yet not before the city experiences a chance of rain early in the afternoon.

As the day unfolds, one might find the city shrouded in a thin veil of fog that clings lovingly to the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge, likely drifting away with the sun’s hopeful rays. With temperatures aiming for a high of 56, attire should blend comfort and warmth – layers will serve you well as you navigate the streets. A light jacket paired with a cozy sweater may be the perfect defense against the lingering chill. Today’s activities might best take shape in a leisurely stroll through the quieter streets of the Mission, indulging in the aromas of freshly brewed coffee or exploring the vivid murals that breathe life into concrete walls, each telling a story of the city’s evolving spirit.
